## Try this [code](https://github.com/marinebon/p2p-dashboard) to develop [Biodiversity Dashboards](https://marinebon.org/p2p-dashboard/biodivExplorer_beach.html#general-information) for your monitoring sites

## Try this [code](http://rpubs.com/eqmh/lme-obis-extractions) to visualize boundaries of selected Large Marine Ecosystems (LMEs) and extract [OBIS](http://obis.org) records from selected [LMEs](http://lme.edc.uri.edu/index.php/digital-data)
<img width="1000px" src="images/lme_extractions.jpg"/>

## Try this [code](https://rpubs.com/eqmh/sat-data-plotter-mapper) to extract sea surface temperature (SST) and chlorophyll-a (CHL) from [ERDDAP](https://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/index.html) servers for selected locations, create time series plots of [SST](https://rpubs.com/eqmh/sst_ts_Patag) and [CHL](https://rpubs.com/eqmh/chla_ts_Patag_v2) and their [climatologies](https://rpubs.com/eqmh/sst_climatology_plot), and generate a map with the latest satellite data.
<img width="1000px" src="images/ts_plots_and_maps.jpg"/>
